title: Patent  Application, "Petition and Assignment Documents and Design Illustrations re: United States Patent #2147 for Corner Sink with Single Drainboard; United States Patent #2090 for Sink with Double Drainboard, Gustav B. Jensen, Designer/ Inventor.", December 30, 1930
medium: Carbon copies on white wove paper; photostats
dimensions:
1956-47-50a - 27.8 x 17.7 cm (11 x 7 in.)
1956-47-50d - 27.8 x 17.7 cm (11 x 7 in.), design for corner sink  with single drainboard
1956-47-50b - 33 x 20.4 cm (13 x 8 in.), Petition for patent, sink with double drainboard
1956-47-50c - 33 x 20.4 cm (11 x 7 in.), Assignment of patent, sink with double drainboard
1956-47-50e - 33 x 20.4 cm (13 x 8 in.), Petition for patent, corner sink with single drainboard
1956-47-50f - 33 x 20.4 cm (13 x 8 in.), Assignment of patent, corner sink with single drainboard
description: The present documents pertain to a patent application for a sink with double drainboard.

tombstone.epitaph: Patent  Application, "Petition and Assignment Documents and Design Illustrations re: United States Patent #2147 for Corner Sink with Single Drainboard; United States Patent #2090 for Sink with Double Drainboard, Gustav B. Jensen, Designer/ Inventor.", December 30, 1930. Carbon copies on white wove paper; photostats. Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-50-a/f.
